preference.name: CATIA_load_for_compare_prefix
preference.preference_description: When loading an assembly for Compare in CATIA, all files are renamed to avoid opening the same file names with different part numbers. Define the prefix added to the new file name by modifying the following variable within Teamcenter Preferences The default prefix value is comp_.
